modName: Malkavs Glass Armor and Weapon retexture
summary: Malkavs Glass Armor and Weapon Retexture
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/2396/titleglassset.png[/img][/center]
[center][img] http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5668/glassmain.png[/img][/center]

If you like this mod, please come back and  [color=red]ENDORSE[/color]

[img]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/5342/description3.png [/img]
This mod changes the texture of all the Glass weapons and armor in the game to something more malachite like. I thought the vanilla Glass set was way too pale and the gold metal was too close to the Dwemer  and Elven sets.  Hope you people enjoy it. It was fun to make it.

What is done:
All male Armor pieces
Female armor now finished too
All weapons, including arrows

[img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4646/instalation.png[/img]
Extract the Zip to your Skyrim folder. 
If you don\'t like the whole set, but just want, let say weapons, open the zip and copy only the weapon files to your Skyrim/Data/Textures folder.
The ore and ingot are in Skyrim/Data/Textures/clutter folder
